Built-in datasets

mapping

Mapping information for 9155 trees.

tree

Repeated size measurements for 9155 trees.

stand_locations

Locations of 15 forest stands.

messy_mapping

Uncleaned mapping data for 9166 trees.

messy_tree

Uncleaned repeated size measurement data.

stand_abiotic

Abiotic data for 15 forest stands.
